sourcesContent:
import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { MoviesLService } from '../services/movies-l.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-movie-detail', templateUrl: './movie-detail.component.html', styleUrls: ['./movie-detail.component.css'] }) export class MovieDetailComponent implements OnInit{ movieDetail:any; movieId:any; movieG:any; movieImg:any; movieCasts:any; movieCrew:any; movieVideos:any; movieTrailer:any; constructor(private http:HttpClient,private activte:ActivatedRoute,private movieD:MoviesLService){ this.activte.params.subscribe((value:any)=>{ this.movieId=value['id'] }) } ngOnInit(): void { // to get movie details this.movieD.getMovieDetail(this.movieId).subscribe((data:any)=>{ this.movieDetail=data this.movieG=data.genres this.movieImg=data.backdrop_path }) // to get movie cast details this.movieD.getMovieCast(this.movieId).subscribe((data)=>{ this.movieCasts=data.cast this.movieCrew=data.crew }) // to get movie videos this.movieD.getMovieVideos(this.movieId).subscribe((data)=>{ this.movieVideos=data.results }) } }
{{ movieDetail.title }}
Release Date: {{ movieDetail.release_date }}.
Genres: {{ gen.name }},
{{ movieDetail.runtime }} runTime
Rating: {{ movieDetail.vote_average | number : "1.1-1" }}
Overview: {{ movieDetail.overview }}
